name: Navalia
description: Design, build and command your fleet of spaceships! Navalia allows you to freely design ships for your fleet, lead them in battle against formidable foes and gradually conquer the galaxy. Unleash your creativity with the innovative Navalia ship editor and bring your creations into battle!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated AMD or Nvidia GPU with at least 1 GB of VRAM Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 560 or equivalent Storage: 1 GB available space
